entry.tran: 和平主义者；反战主义者
entry.def: A pacifist is someone who believes that violence is wrong and refuses to take part in wars.

entry.tran: 和平主义的；反战主义的
entry.def: If someone has pacifist views, they believe that war and violence are always wrong.

means.word_mean: 1. someone opposed to violence as a means of settling disputes
